thread.title: BlackRock Plans to Block Walmart, Dick’s From Some Funds Over Guns

author: Sarah Krouse
title: BlackRock Plans to Block Walmart, Dick’s From Some Funds Over Guns
text:
The world’s largest money manager is stripping retailers that sell guns out of some current and planned exchange-traded funds, the latest sign that weapons sellers are facing the same scrutiny from investors as producers.
Walmart Inc., Dick’s Sporting Goods Inc. and Kroger Co. are among the retailers that will be ruled out of new environmental social and governance-focused funds BlackRock Inc. is planning, a spokeswoman for the world’s largest asset manager said Thursday. The retailers were among those who said they would...
